reviews.title: Love this game
reviews.name: Love this game
reviews.text: Personality this game has a unique catch to it. Most mobile games have ads in the middle of each round but this app has one or two after 15 minutes. I enjoy the concept of this game and it is very entertaining when one is bored. I would recommend this game to the public. Itâ€™s has a fun strategy and can give people goals to achieve. Overall I think that this is an excellent game.
